---
title: "Lucky 3D Scatterplot (Interactive)"
output:
  html_document
---


```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(readxl)
Lucky <- read_excel("Lucky.xlsx")
Lucky$Box <- as.factor(Lucky$Box)

library(plotly)
fig <- plot_ly(Lucky, x = ~Bowl, y = ~Weight, z = ~Totcharms, color = ~Box) |>
  add_markers() |>
  layout(scene = list(xaxis = list(title = 'Bowl'),
                                   yaxis = list(title = 'Weight (g)'),
                                   zaxis = list(title = '# Charms')),
                      legend=list(title=list(text='Box')))
fig
```

See [this GitHub Gist](https://gist.github.com/gjkerns/47cd52013245609cd80f40d6e7e0a3ed) for the code snippet.  The data are available in [this GitHub repository](https://github.com/gjkerns/luckyCharms).
